title: New Summoner spell
body: Something like zhonyas would be a cool idea. i good choice for defensive mid laners like ori or ziggs

replies.body: barrier is the closest thing I want to zhonyas
We really don't need more untargetable champs. People already complain that champs like Fizz and Liss are invulnerable for too much of a fight after buying zhonyas.
jesus christ, that'd be literally cancer. one of the dumbest idea's I've ever seen.
Yeah sure. Vladimir/Lissandra/Kayle + zhonyas +this spell= 7 seconds of invulnerability. No thanks.
If it happens, Zhonya's would have to be removed.
A zhonyas as a summoner spell would be quite over powered. Will never happen.

lol @ ori and ziggs as defensive mid laners. Ziggs is by far the most offensive ranged mid laner there is, always poking, and when needed knocking people away, Ori's damage output is ridiculous so you're wrong about them being defensive mid laners

To the point, no a zhonyas summoner spell would be stupid, 

Fizz > troll poll > that summoner spell > actual zhonyas > GA = he is annoying enough

SO NO TO THIS IDEA
